Drive better business performance using the right data at the right time.
We deliver the data and tools you need, to control spending…even before it happens.

Make decisions and drive change with metrics that matter.

Features of Intelligence
Data integration

Get a single, clear view into spend by combining travel, expense, invoice, ERP and credit card data into one system.

User-friendly dashboards

Quickly access what you need with mobile and interactive dashboards summarizing multiple reports and KPIs.

Vendor Normalisation

Use clean data credit card data to automatically match every transaction with the relevant travel supplier to gain a clear picture of spend, manage budgets and negotiate better discounts.

Customised reporting

Enhance reports or create your own custom dashboards to track your company’s spending patterns and buying behaviour.

Automatic report delivery

Schedule automatic delivery of reports and dashboards with data customised to each audience’s unique needs.
